traits.name: Keen Sight
entries: The stormborn ithjar has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Slippery Serpent
entries: The stormborn ithjar has advantage on ability checks or saving throws made to escape a grapple and saving throws to avoid being {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The stormborn ithjar attacks once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5 damage) slashing damage and 9 (2d8 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6 damage) thunder damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the stormborn ithjar can't use its tail on another target.

actions.name: Storm Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The stormborn ithjar exhales a 30- foot cone of lightning and thunder. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 31 (7d8 damage) lightning damage and 31 (7d8 damage) thunder damage and falls {@condition prone}. If the save succeeds, the creature takes half the lightning and thunder damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}. The discharge of this breath weapon is audible for 1 mile outside and 300 feet inside.
